website_summaries.verdict: If you don't like silicone mitts, these offer a more traditional feel with similar heat resistance.
pros: 100% cotton outer mitt with silicone striping for nonslip gripping
Extra length protects wrists and forearms
Polyester interior, terrycloth lining, recycled cotton infill
cons: Orientation of silicone strips doesn't help in gripping

customer_reviews.title: After too many surprising, frightening burns with mitts I thought I could trust
customer_reviews.text: Edit (2020/08/06) 3 years, still totally recommend them. Comfy w/ a slightly padded feel, probably almost inpossible to burn yourself with shy a tear or cut (which wouldn't be easy), and they have great grip. ---------- After getting my fingertips cooked too many times with Walmart & my local go-to place for kitchen wares :( I decided to hit Amazon and look for my *final* oven mitts. These are those mitts. They're comfy and provide that securing sense of overkill when it comes to handling hot stuff around the oven. Feel ridiculously safe wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: They will be in the garbage soon.
customer_reviews.text: These mitts have been in use for one month. The heat from my oven rack burned a hole in one even though the material was supposed to be safe to 480 degrees. They were washed a couple of times and the silicone lines are peeling off. They will be in the garbage soon.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog kept licking the oven mitts that were hanging off the stove and I realized they were old and soaked with god-knows-what kinds of juices so it was time to upgrade. These popped up early in my search so I just went for it. THEY ARE SO GOOD! The silicone grips really well, I never feel like I'm going to drop Pyrex anymore. They are a nice size and not super puffy and thick. The insulation works great, not even a hint of warmth gets through. Really happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Anna C

customer_reviews.title: High quality, super heat resistant oven mitts!
customer_reviews.text: Got these oven mitts to use when making pizza. The high heat resistance rating was exactly what I was looking for. As you can see in the pic, they come comfortably far up my arm and offer great protection when removing pans from any oven. The non slip silicone striping is an added bonus. Quality is excellent and really can't beat this price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these oven mitts!!
customer_reviews.text: These oven mitts have exceeded my expectations in every way. The materials all feel like great quality. The outside is a nice thick cotton, the interior terrycloth feels nice and comfortable on my hands, the lines of silicone are great both for the heat protection and the gripping and I just noticed on the tag that these have recycled cotton infill (I love that they're even ecofriendly). Just to test them, I heated up some soup in my microwave and took out the bowl with these on. No slipping and I felt absolutely no heat through them. These are a fabulous addition to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Alison K.

customer_reviews.title: Like the color, LOVE the Mitt!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mitts! I bought a pair (Calphalon) from Bed, Bath & Beyond several years ago, and these are better! I love the quality of the construction, the quilted inside, the substantial silicone stripes that give a great 'grip' . . . they are awesome! Plus, I like supporting a small business! I highly recommend these oven mitts, and I appreciated the follow-up from the company owner. That's just good business! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Carol Newlin

customer_reviews.title: Great for handling 500°F cast iron
customer_reviews.text: Occasionally when cooking with cast iron, I heat my cookware to 500° Fahrenheit. My previous oven mitts would smoke a little after handling my cookware at that temperature, as they clearly weren't designed with materials to withstand that temperature. These mitts however work great.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckle

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic and I would recommend then to everyone. They are a beautiful deep red and I love the striping which is where the silicone is located because of this I am able to hold on to everything easily, I have nerve damaged in my hands. They allow me to hold onto the pan longer without feeling the heat. Almost forgot to mention how well they fit and they are not so thick that you keep loosening my grip. I only wish I had found these earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary N.

customer_reviews.title: A big red "thumbs up" is in order!
customer_reviews.text: With an attractive design and useful grippy material, I'm quite pleased with these mitts. The heat resistance is reasonable. If you're holding a dish straight out of the oven for long enough, your hands will get warm, but most importantly you wont get burned. I will note that I've only tested this up to 450°F (~232 °C) but I would be surprised if it doesn't work for the full 480°F (~248°C) that is advertised. They're holding up so far, which leads me to believe the construction is quality and will last for years. Great investment. Pick them up!
customer_reviews.author: Drachen

customer_reviews.title: AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: The size of oven mittens is very important to me since I have a size 13 ring finger. I enjoyed the fact that the mitts went on easily and gripped my hot dishes well. They are rated at just under 500°, which is exactly what I wanted. I would recommend these oven mitts to anyone that bakes a lot. They are quite good!!
customer_reviews.author: john smith

customer_reviews.title: Great heat resistance!
customer_reviews.text: Our old oven mitts are older than my kids. So I found these on Amazon and ordered them, and they’re great! They had good reviews and I really liked the grippy ribs on them as you can see in the picture, can’t wait to give them to her for Christmas. They go well past your wrist so there is plenary of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Budman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: When I asked my father-in-law what he wanted for his birthday he said he needed a new oven mitt; he’s a practical guy but I wanted to get him a nice one. This one was exactly what I was looking for. It’s smaller than your standard oven mitt which is nice because it makes it easier to take things out of the oven. I also really like the silicone lines on the outside because it makes the mitt slip-proof. But most importantly my father-in-law loved his gift!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Y.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: I'm really not happy with these gloves. The silicon strips cling to everything you hold, making it not only difficult to slide away from a hot casserole dish or pot lid, but dangerous as well. They ARE great protection from the heat and they DO cover all of my hand past the wrist, but I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: These oven mitts are great! They fit my hands, give good heat resistance and best of all, they're priced right. The price is for a pair of them, unlike most of the mitts I'm seeing, which are priced per mitt. I haven't had them long, so I can't attest to their durability or washability, but they seem like they'll work just fine. I got the red ones and I really like the color. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Gbobmi

customer_reviews.title: Loved at first, but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I loved these mitts. Yeah, a little weird, but I had been searching for a while for well-made mitts with silicone to help with grip. After only 2 months, the loop ripped off one side of the one mitt - which made it impossible to hang. Not a deal-breaker... I sewed it last week, but now the same mitt ripped on the side I didn’t sew. Sad that they are poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: JessE

customer_reviews.title: Love these oven mitts
customer_reviews.text: Love these oven mitts, have a pair from many years ago and they were very high quality and still going strong. Hope the people I am going to gift them to , will appreciate them as much as I do. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Great OVen Mitts
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these oven mitts a week or so, and they are not only pretty but also very functional. They are long enough to protect wrists and lower arms, so i have not been burned using them. I have touches of deep red in my black and white kitchen; these are just another "pop" of color.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bush

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: These mitts make me realize how thin my old mitts were. These are extra long to protect my arm and the silicone really helps me hold onto my dishes in the oven. UPDATE: I have used these several times now and have a hard time picking up , like a cookie sheet from the oven. I can't even grasp a pan to turn it. What makes matters worse, I have little feeling in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Kern

customer_reviews.title: Started ripping after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: After two months of ownership the fabric began to rip in the area between the thumb and finger part of the mitt. I thought it was a fluke, but then the same thing happened to my second glove. I tried to reach out to seller, but after 5 days I am giving up hope of getting a response. I will say that before they began to tear they worked very well. But 2 months is a pathetic amount of time for what I believed were a premium product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morgenstern

customer_reviews.title: These gloves protect your hands and LOWER arm!
customer_reviews.text: I cook bread in dutch ovens I am always in real danger of a major burn because I have SPMS and RA and can't grip and physically function as well as I used to. My current set of mittens are not large enough for these large dutch ovens BUT the new Mittons, OVEN mittens are perfect. They have yet to make me clutz around with a very hot, 400+degree pot. I am so grateful!!
customer_reviews.author: Bodega

customer_reviews.title: Last kitchen mitts you will ever buy !
customer_reviews.text: Can I just say how much I love these mitts?!! The color is great and adds a wonderful pop of color to my kitchen - and goes great with my red teapot! These mitts have a terry like padding inside (very soft and protects against heat ) but also silicone like lines on the outside so that they won't burn - like my other ones did !;). They also have a little loop so I can hang them in a knob of my kitchen cabinet. Great great mitts - a perfect combo of fabric and silicone ! I think they might be the last kitchen mitts I buy !;$
customer_reviews.author: Yelena Kirakozova

customer_reviews.title: Protects from burning hands
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I can take anything off the stove or out of the oven and hold it as long as needed. The only thing that could be improved would be flexibility. If I need to hold a pan by a small or short handle or by gripping an edge it is difficult and I have to make sure I have a good hold before lifting.
customer_reviews.author: ARae

customer_reviews.title: Thick, silicone helps grip
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my mother after her previous oven mitts started falling apart. She likes how thick these are, although she does think they are a little inflexible because of it. The silicone stripping does help grip dishes though, so over all she is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: These are the best oven mitts that I've owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the best oven mitts that I've owned. The first thing I used these gloves for was moving a very hot cast iron skillet into a 500+ degree oven. Really high heat tolerance and a great grip. They were perfect! I like them more than the silicone oven gloves that I bought for twice the amount! Excellent product. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like to cook and I was really tired of using poorly constructed oven mitts that did not last. I have tried a number of different brands and this pair is perfect! I use them when I grill outside also. They do not slip when holding hot pots and pans which has helped me given the number of times I have dropped a pan on the floor of my kitchen. (: I highly recommend these mitts. Great gift also.
customer_reviews.author: BH3

customer_reviews.title: Great for folks with large hands
customer_reviews.text: I had a really hard time finding oven mitts that fit my large hands. I'm not a huge person, but I don't like squeezing my hands in tiny mitts. These are comfy without being enormous. Heat resistence is very good, but don't expect to hold a casserole dish for longer than 20 seconds. They have a great look and seem well made. Have been using these for a couple months and no complaints beyond the heat resistance. Which I won't count against it given it's construction. It does what you need unless you plan on holding a hot pot for very long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: madman

customer_reviews.title: Good but too large in size.
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of these. They are just really hard to maneuver. I bought them because I read they were smaller in size. Well, they are still too big and bulky. I often ruin baked goods because the mitt hits the side as I am trying to remove the pan from the oven. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best oven mitts I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I burned myself badly on a oven mitt that was was simply moving a pan from the oven to the counter. I search online for several gloves and decided on these. They are fantastic. Great resistance to heat. I no longer have to rush when carrying a hot pan. They are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Armbruster

customer_reviews.title: great reviews, but just OK
customer_reviews.text: it does the job, but is so thick, it's difficult to hold. often think I'll drop my hot dish, but it keeps me from burning my fingers. wish there was a better design out there.
customer_reviews.author: J Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Oh my word!  These are the BEST!!!  Excellent quality, super fit, and just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for a while for a good pair of oven mitts. I purchased a pair and they were awful. So, I started the hunt again and found these mitts. Love their story on how they started the company and after researching them (didn't want another bad set), I bought them and received them a day or so ago. They are AWESOME! Great, great quality, very long and super fit. I will purchase another pair when the other colors come back in stock. These were considered "red", but they are a beautiful reddish burgundy to me and that is exactly what I hoped they would be. Thank you for making such a quality product!! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Smells like an old sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.text: Sellers' description says, "with the Heat Resistance of Silicone and Flexibility of Cotton" and I have to add, the stink of an old sleeping bag put away wet and retrieved a year later." Fooey. How do you think it smells holding a 350 degree oven pan?
customer_reviews.author: D L

customer_reviews.title: Fit my hand well
customer_reviews.text: Usually mitts are too big and thick, I can't tell if I actually grabbed the handles of the pan. These are just right, not too big for my hand, but fit my husband's also. Long enough so that I won't accidently burn my arm. The silicone on the outside of the mitt makes for a good grip. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: good oven mits
customer_reviews.text: these mits were priced right. They seem to insulate from heat very well, and the strips help with gripping items. They are surprisingly flexible for their thickness. as for size I use a large mens size glove and these fit quite well.. only time will tell how well they hold up, so for now four stars.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great pot holders
customer_reviews.text: I roast a lot of vegetables at 450 and had a fancier oven mitt that developed holes and was never quite heat resistant enough, so my hand always got hot. These are great - simple cotton but I can hold the baking sheet for easily over 2 minutes if I have to flip some finicky brussels sprouts, and I don't feel anything close to pain. Seems like my hand gets a little hot quickly, but then no hotter so I'm comfortable holding the pan. They are also nice looking and feel good on my hands, but my main concern was heat transfer and protection and these more than do the job. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: A wrist saver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas to replace his Ove-Gloves. He loves them! He rarely burns his wrists now because they are covered by these gloves. I only gave it 4 stars in durability and easy to hold because the gloves have already gotten singed and my small hands have trouble gripping the edges of the hot pans.
customer_reviews.author: HotMomma07

customer_reviews.title: They work for me but I'm a small woman
customer_reviews.text: They aren't real long but I prefer that because it is easy for me to handle heavy things from my oven. They appear to be a nice thick fabric. No rubber like layers so I'm happy. Not sure if they will last for years like my last one but I'm still very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dale S.

customer_reviews.title: STINK!
customer_reviews.text: At first it looks like a very nice pair of oven mitts. I did not use them tho because they smell musty. I'm not sure what causes the smell. Maybe the material dyes?? But for sure I'm returning!!
customer_reviews.author: YiaYia55.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent oven mitts for the BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and heat resistant and surprisingly great for the grill! I have always chosen straight silicone for the grill but my wife wanted these because the "dark red color matches our kitchen so nicely!" I had a flare up and had to move some steaks. These gloves were literally in the flames for several seconds and I barely felt any heat through them. The silicone stripes are an added bonus. I'm assuming they help with heat protection and they also grip trays incredibly well. The food on the tray falls off before the tray will fall from the mitts. I can almost rest a sheet pan at a 180 degree angle (key word here...almost). Great product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rayna Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Big thick gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are for huge hands. My hands are small with longer skinny finger, so not a good fit. My husband loves them. I’m going to look for a smaller pair (for myself) About the silicon strips- I hate them... they get stuck, and I either drop something or burn myself. I think the gloves are overall good quality .
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, High Quality Oven Mitt!
customer_reviews.text: I am in the kitchen ALL the time and I really love these oven mitts (definitely a steal at this price). Just like the description says, "these have the heat resistance of silicone and the flexibility of cotton". My concern was that the thin strips of silicone would make the mitts stiff but that's not the case at all. They are super flexible and comfortable! I plan to buy some as gifts for friends who love to cook. Definitely a kitchen staple!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Spies

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting oven mitts....finally!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new oven mitts and I am obsessed!!!! They are not only high quality and cute looking, they are soft to the touch when you put your hands in them and they fit great!!! Many other mitts I have purchased do not fit...they are bulky and slip when handling hot items. Not these...the "grips" are well placed and the mitt fits and enables me to move hot items from the oven to the counter with ease! Ordering a couple more because the price is great and they will make awesome Easter basket gifts!!!
customer_reviews.author: jackie pappas

customer_reviews.title: The best oven mitts I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been letting me in her kitchen for a little over 50 years. I can't count the number of times that I've burned myself with her pot holders. Her oven mitts were never big enough for my hands. Not any more. These oven mitts are big enough, and you can hold a very hot pan a lot longer before you even feel the heat. They probably should charge more for them, but that's not a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Tom E.

customer_reviews.title: These mitts are quite beautiful and a good value since you get a pair
customer_reviews.text: These mitts are quite beautiful and a good value since you get a pair. They are thick and the same size as a mitt I recently bought at a fancy kitchen supply store. I have very small hands, and I am managing just fine with these, perhaps because they are so well padded. I haven't washed them yet, but directions say to wash in cold water and lay flat to dry.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Work well. Kinda big for my small hands.
customer_reviews.text: They work good even in a very hot oven. Because they are so big I'll sometimes end up grabbing part of the food along with just the edge of a pan. Not a big deal. But I do feel a bit clumsy when I'm using them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The quality is superior
customer_reviews.text: These oven mitts but they were too big for me and the strips make them too stiff. I would like them better without strips. The quality of the mitts is superior otherwise. In other words, plain oven mitts are good enough as long as they are thick enough to keep from overheating my hands. I really like the terry lining. Nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Helen L. Kistler

customer_reviews.title: Best oven mitts I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: These mitts definitely keep the heat away from your hands. They are made well and I love the slip resistant coating on the outside. I ordered these, because I kept burning my hand through the mitts I had and these are excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, just the right length for me to protect my arms...because I’m always reaching in the oven before I pull the racks out.
customer_reviews.author: frog498

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent oven mitts. Plenty of protection picking up hot metal trays and the ribs on the mitts are sticky and make it easy to pick up corningware. Best pair of oven mitts we ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pastore

customer_reviews.title: Just GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described, no issues with it so far. GREAT heat resistance and GREAT gripping, it's like it's got tape all over it! Holding up well more than a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mitts
customer_reviews.text: They are great oven mitts, I like the outside with silicone strips for holding dishes. The length is good and are not super stiff that I can't move my thumbs. I would buy from again, they seem like a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ann

customer_reviews.title: I Love my new Big Red House Oven Mitts
customer_reviews.text: I just love these Big Red House Oven Mitts, they feel comfortable, heat resistant & very pretty. & I'm not hiding them, I hung them on a hook on my kitchen wall next to the stove. They look great and that way they are very handy when needed. Thanks so Much Pat Snyder
customer_reviews.author: tim snyder

customer_reviews.title: they are what they are supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: My old mits were tearing between the thumb and index finger OUCH! Tried a couple different silicone type and my hands are just to big to quickly get in and out of them. These provide excellent heat protection. I just wish they were more grippy. I used to just leave my old mits on the oven fan, but these slide off - Thump into my stew YUCK! Dang it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Queervortex

customer_reviews.title: They came out of the package with a "new plastic" ...
customer_reviews.text: They came out of the package with a "new plastic" smell, so I washed them and a seam is starting to split already. They do work quite well for gripping and keeping hands from being burned by hot pans though.
customer_reviews.author: Aili J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of the thin silicone stripes, expected more protection. However, I have used and they worked fine. They are pretty too! Thicker padding and a little longer than my cheap old oven mitts. UPDATE: Everyone who visits and tries these mitts, loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: MA@SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for old mitts
customer_reviews.text: Our old mitts must have been over 20 yrs old, with burn marks on the outside, and increasingly inadequate insulation inside. Replaced them with these, and they have ably proven their worth. And since the color matches our kitchen, they look a lot better, too.
customer_reviews.author: Flattop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Hold & so far heat resistant
customer_reviews.text: These mitts are a good size. I have trouble with some mitts being so big that I have to be extra careful I don't drop something. Since these mitts aren't as big they feel safer.
customer_reviews.author: Lori in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Best oven mitts I've used in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Best oven mitts I've used in a long time! I feel like I could stick my hands in a fire and they would still be protected in these! Here's an analogy: wearing these oven mitts are to lifting hot items as wearing my rain boots and raincoat are to being outside on a rainy day. You just don't have to think 2x that you're protected. Silicone lines are a nice benefit too. They really help get a good grip on things. The size is perfect for my hands. I could see someone with very small hands thinking that they're too big. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non-slip stripes a big help
customer_reviews.text: The stripes on the mitts are non-slip, a big help when lifting a hot pan, etc. Way better than any mitts I've had before. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. Alonso Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: thick and durable
customer_reviews.text: These oven mitts are very sturdy and durable! I like the silicone strips on the outside to help grip the hot pan from the oven, no slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Micah C.

customer_reviews.title: It fits
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who always complains about oven mitts being too small. He tried them on and they were well sized... easy to get on and off. They are well insulated so you don't burn in the oven and the grippers were nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Resourceful House Elf

customer_reviews.title: Great pot holders
customer_reviews.text: These pot holders are our primary ones used in the kitchen. They are wonderful! comfortable, very heat resistant and slip resistant. I will purchase again when I need ones. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: P. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Very functional but also cute
customer_reviews.text: Used as hot oven mitts. They have the strength and protection offered in a big rubber glove, but are more flexible and softer inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mee

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Mom loves these because of the grippers. I love them because they protect my hands from getting fried. But if you have weak hands like us the grippers are great!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for every cook
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I was frustrated with the small size of our current mitts. They fit great, and I like them so much that I have bought at least six more pair for gifts for my cooking friends. They are also quite pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Ermine

customer_reviews.title: Serious grip and zero heat penetration

customer_reviews.title: Attractive

customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: BIG RED HOUSE Oven Mitts, Heat Resistance of Silicone, 480 F Heat Resistant Pair Red
customer_reviews.text: Well made and pretty. They face has ridges of silicon that look like hot glue lines. It makes the glove a little stiff but that hasn’t been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: handles heat well
customer_reviews.text: My old oven mitts were really worn out. I found these red beauty oven mitts and fell in love. They are comfortable, handles heat very well and has the grip assistance. I hang mine close to the oven for easy access and they are pretty. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Strange odor

customer_reviews.title: Good buy

customer_reviews.title: Great mitts!

customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love my new oven mitts!
customer_reviews.text: Wow - I LOVE these new oven mitts. So happy I bought these - and also just can't believe how affordable they are. Definitely buying these as housewarming gifts for everyone I know! Do they come in more colors?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Roasting Pans
